semanticMarkup.ling.normalize.lib

Class Normalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • semanticMarkup.ling.normalize.lib.Normalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INormalizer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FNAv19Normalizer, TreatisehNormalizer

    public abstract class Normalizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements INormalizer
    Normalizer implements a strategy to normalize text according to the previous version of charaparser
